metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3640 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: [x86/mm: a per-cpu entry area leak was identified through the init_cea_offsets function when prefetchnta and prefetcht2 instructions being used for the per-cpu entry area mapping to the user space]

criterions.comment: linux package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
